channel.title: Robotics on ConnorMcKinley

item.title: [Robotics] Autonomous Hospital Bed Robot
item.description: Amidst the ongoing global health crisis brought on by the coronavirus pandemic, hospitals worldwide are grappling with a significant shortage of nursing staff. In this critical juncture, my team initiated the development of a robotic solution, aiming to optimize hospital workflows and alleviate the burden on nursing staff by automating routine tasks. I was responsible for implementing the line tracing algorithm that empowers the BedBot to navigate seamlessly through the hospital corridors.
